prodNameC: 伯樂亞 細胞巨大性病毒 免疫球蛋白G
ingredientsDesc:
MT PLATE  wells coated with Cytomegalovirus.

CAL ：Diluted human serum, containing known concentrations of anti-CMV IgG
antibodies, in Phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/L with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09% 

CONJ ：monoclonal antibodies labelled with Peroxidase, in phosphate buffer solution
containing phenol 0.05% and Bronidox 0.02%. 

CONTROL IgG ：Human serum not containing anti-CMV IgG antibodies, diluted in Phosphate buffer 0.01 mol/L, with BSA 1% and sodium azide 0.09%.

WASH BUF 10x ：Phosphate buffered saline, concentrated 10 times; contains Brij 0.5%.

SAMP DIL 50x ： Proteic solution concentrated 50 times, with added phenol 0.05% and Bronidox 0.02%.

SUBS TMB ：Tetramethylbenzidine 0.26 mg/mL and hydrogen peroxide 0.01% stabilised in
citrate buffer 0.05 mol/L (pH 3.8).
H2SO4 0.3 M ：H2SO4 0.3 mol/L.
applicantName: 美商伯瑞股份有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路4段126號14樓
efficacy: 對抗人類血清中細胞巨大性病毒IgG一級抗體的定性和定量的測定的免疫酵素法。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3175 巨細胞病毒血清試劑
